title: Metropolis
writer: Osamu Tezuka (comic book), Katsuhiro Ôtomo (screenplay), Marc Handler (English version)
actors: Yuka Imoto, Kei Kobayashi, Kôki Okada, Tarô Ishida
plot: Kenichi and his uncle Shunsaku Ban must find the mystery behind robot girl Tima.
languages: Japanese, French, German, Italian, Spanish, English, Russian
